entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `RuntimeInformation.OSDescription` is really `KernelDescription` #83287
  • Make it possible to systematically disable console output. #83283
  • [wasm] Review `FROZEN_CACHE` setting in the build targets #83281
    8.0.0
  • Obsolete JsonSerializerOptions.AddContext #83280
    8.0.0
  • Add an AppContext switch that disables using reflection by default in JsonSerializerOptions #83279
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for memset/memcpy unrolling #83277
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to get modern Windows icons to System.Drawing.SystemIcons. #83276
  • [API Proposal]: Modify method for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #83270
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store fails with a PrincipalOperationException after any successful call to ValidateCredentials against the local SAM store #83269
  • [Blazor WASM] System.InvalidProgramException: Unable to run method 'void Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Language.Legacy.ParserHelpers:.cctor ()': locals size too big. #83260
    8.0.0
  • Empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage on Linux #83259
  • JIT: Investigate slow contexts in coreclr_tests #83258
  • Ildasm on Ubuntu does not output resource files #83254
  • [mono][jit] Consolidate Mono IR operations that deal with SIMD #83252
    Future
  • JIT fails to recognize when length is never negative for `Span<T>::.ctor(void*, int32)` #83248
  • Updated RID Plan #83246
  • [release/6.0] Doublelinklist GC failures on Mono #83245

Closed

  • [emsdk] TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #83278
  • DispatchProxy.Create reads AssemblyLoadContext.Name but treats it as an assembly name #80387
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetTypeInfo throws when TypeInfoResolver is `null` #80529
    8.0.0
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Accurately log catastrophic test failures and freezes in source-gened test infrastructure #77735
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add IReadOnlySet2 for speeeding up set operations #83229
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryMarshal.CreateReadOnlySpan that takes `in` param #83191
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82464
    8.0.0
  • SourceLink info missing from unmanaged CLR PDBs #83184
  • [API Proposal]: TryUpdateOrRemove for the ConcurrentDictionary<K,V> collection #68742
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Polymorphic Type Resolving Issue #77532
    Future
  • Crash in coreclr!ILCodeVersion::GetActiveNativeCodeVersion #79326
    8.0.0
  • Unexpected performance dropoff for MathF.Exp in loops with high iteration counts #83265
  • JIT: gtGetStructHandleIfPresent may return SIMD handles that normalize (via `impNormStructType`) to wrong types #83091
  • required and jsignore prevent correct serialization #83257
  • [mono][jit] Optimize loading constants from imm on arm64 #83199
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT doesnt look at the associated Property/Event when accessing methods #71985
    8.0.0
  • [REQ] Simplified way to consume async code anywhere with new methods on Task class #83113
  • [RyuJIT][ARM] Redundant overflow check in "C / X" #46010
    8.0.0
  • Zero-length cpblk or initblk should be removed #12807
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests crashing #83241
  • [JSImport] and Exceptions #81710
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename VirtualMethodTableManagedImplementation and add manual CCW to test generated RCW #83285
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Mono] Fix address data emitted in the MonoProfilerGCRoots ETW event #83284
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix the variable name #83282
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83273
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Test out new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono] Disable DoublinkList/dlstack tests #83268
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the second copy of ILLink.Shared project and source code #83263
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe container types optimizations. #83251
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update emsdk #83244
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Prevent use of null when processing ALPN list #81797
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.5
  • [release/7.0] Fix PAX extended attribute reading logic to treat '=' character as valid in the value strings. #83177
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.5
  • [7.0] Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written. #83267
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.5
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update the Roslyn version our ref-pack generators reference to 4.5.0 #83238
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName in DispatchProxy #82807
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.5
  • [wasm] Introduce jiterpreter control flow pass #83247
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add tar tests to confirm entries owned by deleted users can still be read or written #83126
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.16
  • Massively simplify getBaseJitTypeAndSizeOfSIMDType and the general SIMD handle caching/lookup #83228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] code cleanup #83210
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix path for packing #83017
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Optimized loading imm on arm64. #83204
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implements correct handling of RequiresAssemblyFiles on properties and events #83195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Change logic around GC.Collect in objwriter #83249
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add more win-arm64 entries in the net6 manifest #83237
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Flow emsdk using a stable package name instead of one that will break every preview #83208
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow 0-sized block ops #83224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix missing branch target table update in jiterpreter #83236
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [workloads] Update the workload descriptions #83223
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable folding small-typed returned indirections #82846
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.16
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 7.0.5
  • [browser] cold start benchmark with download throttling and latency #83220
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82805
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • [no merge] call mono_pmip_u in the crash handler #83219
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a primitive to split statements at a specified tree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Testmerging jit64 #83151
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2132695 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Test merging baseservices/threading #83143
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update usage of AllowEmptyTelemetry based on changes to the task in the SDK #82804
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix processing of x86 test results #82301
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add exceptions to TAR extended attribute constructors to disallow '=' and '\n' characters in keys and values. #82812
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • Revert "[wasm] Revert to using latest chrome for testing" #83234

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #31134
    8.0.1xx
  • Backport Docker `--platform` switch support to .NET 7.latest #31133
  • Migrating C++/CLI project throws compiler warning C4945 #31123
  • During installation of SDK 8.0 P2, some components still have the P1 branding. #31121
  • Solution filter fails to build for valid paths on Linux #31119
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries NET 8 preview 2 sdk, installing maui template failed with error "Workload ID maui is not recognized." #31116
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries net 8 preview 2 SDK, running web project failed in CLI. #31114

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31118
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31108
    Area-Infrastructure
  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishAot #31109
  • 30784 dotnet info workload info #31007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add explicit deployment tools dependency #31129
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] fix columns when param is specified #31087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31113
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Document for breaking changes, Area-NetSDK
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: method attribute target for records for targeting primary constructor #7047

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update collection literal natural type #7039

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UI/interaction issues still present in Document Outline. #67264
    17.7
  • CS7038: Failed to emit module 'name': Unable to determine specific cause of the failure. #67258
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Expose an optional FilterSpan public API on SyntaxTreeAnalysisContext and SemanticModelAnalysisContext #67257
  • Remove from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Features the deprecated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Elfie #67256
  • Remove unused parameter IDE0060 should not fire for methods with an LoggerMessageAttribute #67253

Closed

  • CSharpAddMissingImportsRefactoringProvider depends on EditorFeature service #66157
  • Compiler doesnt create field in StateMachine in release mode #66829
    C# 12.0
  • CS7035 should report the bad value #67117
    Compiler.Next
  • Unexpected name conflict error in EE #67188
    C# 12.0
  • EE: Should not bind to display class parameters #18426
    Backlog
  • Display class locals "shadow" regular locals and parameters in EE #67177
    C# 12.0
  • This behavior is controlled by the code style option "Use expression body for methods", which is found here: #67254
  • Unexpected "IDE0060 Remove unused parameter" suggestion for a Primary Constructor parameter #67013

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to one upstream ingestion feed #67263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE
  • [Infra] Take insertion PRs to main out of draft mode #67261
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Use a common mechanism so Taggers access the main thread at the same time. #67259
    Area-IDE
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Analyzer driver fixes for span-based analysis #67255
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Make the import of IPasteTrackingService optional #67238
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update LSP protocol version #67260
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Compute PatternMatching result in parallel when refreshing completion list #67249
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Warn when taking address of local or parameter in async method #66915
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Include faulty version number in version format diagnostic #67251
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix PatternMatcher caching in CompletionHelper #67232
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Compute TextChange based on syntax instead of text #67120
    Area-IDE
  • Make Document Outline computation and update asynchronous. #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Don't show expanded items when filter text length <2 #67049
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Improve EnC test helpers, add repro for #67243 #67252
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive
  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • cant get windows authentication credentials via defaultcredentials #47143
  • Conditionally provided parameters in Blazor's razor syntax #47142
  • [QuickGrid] Consider using reflection to avoid having to box every value (PropertyColumn Format). #47141
  • [QuickGrid] Don't use scoped CSS for QuickGrid.razor #47140
  • [QuickGrid] Reevaluate the number of rows on the last page of a Virtualized QuickGrid #47139
  • [QuickGrid] Consider making debouncing requests configurable, or smarter. #47138
  • [QuickGrid] Miscellaneous TODOs #47137
  • adding PhysicalFileProvider causes 404 on other static files #47136
  • Issue with running hosted Blazer WebAssembly app caused by props file contents #47135
  • Having parity between IParsable support in RDF and RDG #47134
  • Consider breaking API change for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.RenderMode #47133
    8.0-preview3
  • Possible request delegate generator bug with non-valid C# identifier names #47129
  • .NET Core Hosting is corrupted after sysprep #47128
  • HttpContext.Response.ContentLength return null (with System.Text.Json) #47127
  • Add option to refresh the claims of a logged in user from UserInfo endpoint #47125
  • dotnet watch epic fail on Ubuntu #47122
  • ApiConventionNameMatch doesn't work as expected #47120

Closed

  • Consider setting InvariantGlobalization in api template #47029
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Based on cell value changing color #47015
  • Assigning an object with implicit operator (cast to string) to Blazor component's parameter causes InvalidCastException #18042
    8.0-preview3
  • aspnetcore-ci release/7.0 failed #47132
  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installed, the hyperlink for "here" on installer UI is 6.0 link not 7.0 link. #44615
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint implementation #46988
    8.0-preview3
  • LocalStorage reading on AuthenticationStateProvider causes infinite redirection loop #47019

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable nullability in RDG and fix warnings #47144
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Endpoint discovery #47126
    area-blazor
  • Fix x86 folder contents in ARM64 Windows Server Hosting Bundle installer #47124
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47123
    area-grpc
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.5
  • Set InvariantGlobalization in api template #47066
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Source-build: Allow setting KnownAppHostPack and KnownRuntimePack #46735
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, community-contribution, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #47099
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.5
  • Follow up on IParsable changes and update tests #47102
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Razor Component endpoint implementation #47117
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cead3d5` to `50e07d1` #47130
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `c8375a9` to `9395d4e` #47131
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide more control over when a complete (blind) load of all symbols occurs #3737
    8.0.0
  • Native and Managed Heap Improvements #3736
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add analyzers, fix issues detected by them, style enforcement, and some misc bugs in SOSRunner #3721

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] Triggered VisualState only gets applied for a short time, then is undone #13837
  • SearchBar centering inconsistency on Android with MaximumWidthRequest #13835
  • Masking(PatternMask) with MudBlazor not working in Blazor hybrid #13834
  • System.FieldAccessException: Field `Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VisualElement:ZIndexProperty' is inaccessible #13830
  • In Frame Text and Image Not Fit and Collection View items not swipe correctly left or Right #13829
  • Black screen when home menu item icon doesn't exist #13827
  • Unable to add icon to Tabbed page #13826
  • [Android] NullReferenceException in `ShellFlyoutTemplatedContentRenderer.HeaderContainer.UpdateMinimumHeight` #13825
  • exception throw for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.Shape" #13823
  • iOS Background Update Notification is starting the app #13822
  • Port SetTabBarIsVisible To TabbedPage From Shell #13819
  • IsPassword property of Entry on Android don't change the entry appearance #13815
  • Shell Search leaves screen darkened after navigation #13813
  • Android: ListView Item selected color is by default Orange and no property available to change this color #13812
  • [Android] - Opacity property not working properly at initial loading time for Frame and ListView control #13811
  • Flickering when calling Navigation.PopAsync(false). #13810

Closed

  • Blazor Maui Listening on public port, access is denied #12475
  • MAUI for CPU ARM 64 #13789
  • When building on Android and creating an .apk file, the file size is too large. #13785
  • Android Net8.0 Publish failing with error XAGJS7023: System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #12945
    Backlog
  • [Bug] MAUI icon don't get resized to proper size on Android, renders extra accent overlay on Windows #10219
    Backlog
  • When both relative layout width and height constraint is set, child layout is not getting focused. #13600
  • Maui Blazor - using zxing js import first time working but not working second time when openning maui camera capture #13796

PullRequests

Created

  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Fix issue updating the Path Data #13816
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [NO MERGE] FilePicker on Mac Catalyst does not always return the file picked #13814
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13808
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add references to Blazor Hybrid in .NET MAUI Templates #13821
    area/blazor 🕸️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [MacOS/iOS] Fixed incorrect color of RadioButton in Dark Mode using Default Control Template. #13215
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix Windows CollectionView EmptyView alignment #10845
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Disable caching when loading images from streams #13111
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #13799
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix Flyout and TitleView Offset Measurements #12480
    area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Reenable ViewTransform unit tests for iOS #13642
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `VisualElement.Clip` #13806
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig file_header_template is not applied in scaffolded migrations #30453

Closed

  • EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30273

PullRequests

Merged

  • [SMALL] Fix to #30273 - EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30452
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23156.3 #30421

Updated

  • Allow set operations for columns that map to same store type #30400
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30273 - EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30451
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15768
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15767
  • Change to test removing netcoreapp3.0 from SBRP #15766
  • Add alpine source build CI leg #15765

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #15757
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #15756
  • Use a stable package name to aquire the emsdk package version #15761

Updated

  • Enable filtering of tarball extraction #15717
  • [7.0.1xx] Automate Asp.net template updates in dotnet/installer #15737
  • Add VMR sync functionality into `dotnet/dotnet`'s Codespaces #15750
